snippet: A mother who smokes cigarettes was ordered by a judge today to give up custody of her 8-year-old asthmatic daughter because the child was in danger from the smoke.   The girl's father, Steve Masone, who has been seeking custody since a 1987 divorc...
lead_paragraph: A mother who smokes cigarettes was ordered by a judge today to give up custody of her 8-year-old asthmatic daughter because the child was in danger from the smoke. The girl's father, Steve Masone, who has been seeking custody since a 1987 divorce, contended that the smoking of the mother, Susan Tanner, was making the girl's asthma worse. Ms. Tanner denied smoking near the girl.

headline.main: Mother Who Smokes Loses Custody of Asthmatic Girl
